binary-item|XREngine.Audio.csproj|runtim.notes: Verified from Steam Audio upstream LICENSE.md (Apache-2.0) and local file metadata (ProductName=Steam Audio, CompanyName=Valve Corporation, FileVersion=4.6.0).

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|..\\Build\\D.notes: Assumes these DLLs are standard FFmpeg LGPL binaries staged for HLS playback support.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|C:\\Users\\<.notes: LAME encoder library; NAudio.Lame wrapper is MIT, but the native libmp3lame DLL is under LGPL-2.0-or-later.
Same as 32-bit: native LAME encoder library under LGPL-2.0-or-later.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|ffmpeg.exe.notes: Use LGPL-compatible FFmpeg builds for redistribution. Confirm build configuration with `ffmpeg -L`.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|runtimes\\wi.notes: Part of FFmpeg LGPL binary distribution.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|openvr_api.d.notes: Assumes this is the standard OpenVR SDK binary from Valve.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|OVRLipSync.d.notes: Redistributable in binary form under the Oculus SDK License. Not open-source and not GPL-compatible, but can be included alongside AGPL-3.0 code as a separate proprietary component.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|$(MetaOvrLip.notes: Property-based include path for the optional ThirdParty OVR LipSync drop-folder binary.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|RestirGI.Nat.notes: This DLL is from the NVIDIA RTXGI SDK, which includes ReSTIR GI. RTXGI is not open-source; it is distributed under the NVIDIA RTX SDK License Agreement. Redistribution in binary form is permitted, but the license is proprietary and not GPL-compatible.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|$(NvidiaRtxg.notes: Property-based include path for the optional ThirdParty RTXGI drop-folder binary.

binary-item|XREngine.csproj|runtimes\\wi.notes: MagicPhysX itself is MIT-licensed. It is a .NET binding over NVIDIA PhysX 5, which is distributed under NVIDIA's PhysX license (BSD-style, but proprietary to NVIDIA). You should ship both the MagicPhysX MIT license and the NVIDIA PhysX license text in your notices.
Native rive.dll in this repo is built from the rive-sharp submodule's rive-cpp submodule; local LICENSE file is MIT.

binary-item|XREngine.Editor.csproj|C:\\P.owner: Khronos Group (OpenXR loader), distributed via Valve/SteamVR
binary-item|XREngine.Editor.csproj|C:\\P.notes: OpenXR loader is Apache-2.0; confirm version from the SteamVR installation if you need exact text.

binary-item|XREngine.VRClient.csproj|ope.notes: Same OpenVR SDK binary family as other openvr_api.dll entries.

checked-binary|XRENGINE/openvr_api.dll.notes: Checked binary; confirm hash matches the official OpenVR SDK build you rely on.

checked-binary|XRENGINE/OVRLipSync.dll.notes: Binary redistribution permitted under the Oculus SDK License. Must remain separate from AGPL-3.0 code.

checked-binary|XRENGINE/runtimes/win-x64.notes: Same as above; verify this DLL comes from the MagicPhysX NuGet package or its official build. Include both MagicPhysX (MIT) and NVIDIA PhysX license texts.

submodule|Build/Submodules/rive-sharp.notes: All Rive runtimes are MIT-licensed per Rive's published licensing policy. The rive-sharp repo lacks a root LICENSE file, but inherits MIT from its rive-cpp submodule (verified locally and upstream).

nested|CDT|CoACD.notes: Based on upstream CDT license text; verify if your fetched revision differs.

nuget|StirlingLabs.assimp.native.win-x64.notes: Verified from NuGet catalog metadata for this exact package version (licenseExpression=BSD-3-Clause).

reference|XREngine.csproj|RiveSharp|..\\.notes: Locally built from the rive-sharp submodule. All Rive runtimes are MIT-licensed per Rive's published licensing policy.
